name: Assembly-Info-Task
description: Set assembly information such as Version, Copyright and Trademark etc.
author: Bleddyn Richards

inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: Source Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source folder for the assembly info files, can be root as it will find all files recursively.

inputs.name: FileNames
inputs.label: Source Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the assembly info file names (AssemblyInfo.cs, AssemblyInfo.vb, GlobalInfo.cs). For .Net Core specify the project file (Project.csproj).

inputs.name: Title
inputs.label: Title
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a friendly name for the assembly.

inputs.name: Product
inputs.label: Product
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the product information for the assembly.

inputs.name: Description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a short description that summarizes the nature and purpose of the assembly.

inputs.name: Company
inputs.label: Company
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the company name for the assembly.

inputs.name: Copyright
inputs.label: Copyright
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the assembly or product copyright information e.g. Copyright Â© $(date:yyyy) Example Ltd

inputs.name: Trademark
inputs.label: Trademark
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the assembly or product trademark information.

inputs.name: Culture
inputs.label: Culture
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide information on what culture the assembly supports. Leave empty for non-satellite assemblies.

inputs.name: Configuration
inputs.label: Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the build configuration for the assembly, such as debug or release.

inputs.name: VersionNumber
inputs.label: Assembly Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the assembly version. Must be in the format digit.digit.digit.digit see the marketplace listing for [more information](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bleddynrichards.Assembly-Info-Task).

inputs.name: FileVersionNumber
inputs.label: File Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the file version. Must be in the format digit.digit.digit.digit see the marketplace listing for [more information](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bleddynrichards.Assembly-Info-Task).

inputs.name: InformationalVersion
inputs.label: Informational Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the informational version. See the marketplace listing for [more information](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bleddynrichards.Assembly-Info-Task).
